}

response.name: error
response.body:
{
    "status": 400,
    "message": [
        "action must be one of the following values: DEBIT, CREDIT",
        "amount must be a number conforming to the specified constraints",
        "description must be a string",
        "walletId should not be empty",
        "walletId must be a UUID"
    ],
    "timestamp": "2023-10-25T22:03:59.203Z",
    "path": "/api/v1/wallet/transactions"
}
